subject: Re: [junit] Swing Testing
msgSnippet: ... What I do is to have the action listener delegate to a class that I can unit test. -- Robert Koss, Ph.D.     | Training, Mentoring, Contract Development
messageBody:
On 12/20/02 1:28 AM, "Arvind Sharma" <mailtoarvind@...> wrote:

> Hi,
> I am new to junit framework. I want to know what
> will be the best way to write test classes for Action
> Listeners of a Swing GUI. I mean how do we to test the
> objects of Action Listener Classes.
>

What I do is to have the action listener delegate to a class that I can unit
test.


--
Robert Koss, Ph.D. | Training, Mentoring, Contract Development
Senior Consultant | Object Oriented Design, C++, Java
www.objectmentor.com | Extreme Programming
